import React,{useEffect,useRef}from"react";import"./UniverseBg.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const PLANETS=[{size:60,color:"#6cf",orbit:180,speed:22,glow:"#6cf6"},{size:38,color:"#f6c",orbit:120,speed:14,glow:"#f6c7"},{size:24,color:"#ffb347",orbit:80,speed:9,glow:"#ffb34788"},{size:16,color:"#fff",orbit:40,speed:6,glow:"#fff7"}];const STAR_COUNT=80;const MOVING_STAR_COUNT=8;function random(min,max){return Math.random()*(max-min)+min;}export default function UniverseBg(){const bgRef=useRef();// Parallax mouse
useEffect(()=>{const bg=bgRef.current;if(!bg)return;let mouseX=0.5,mouseY=0.5;function onMove(e){const rect=bg.getBoundingClientRect();mouseX=(e.clientX-rect.left)/rect.width;mouseY=(e.clientY-rect.top)/rect.height;bg.style.setProperty('--mx',mouseX);bg.style.setProperty('--my',mouseY);}window.addEventListener('mousemove',onMove);return()=>window.removeEventListener('mousemove',onMove);},[]);// Sinh sao tĩnh, sao động, hành tinh, nebula
useEffect(()=>{const bg=bgRef.current;if(!bg)return;bg.innerHTML='';// Nebula động
const nebula=document.createElement('div');nebula.className='universe-nebula';bg.appendChild(nebula);// Sao tĩnh
for(let i=0;i<STAR_COUNT;i++){const star=document.createElement('div');let className='universe-star';// Sao lớn động
if(i<4)className+=' big';star.className=className;const size=i<4?random(3.5,6):random(1,2.5);star.style.width="".concat(size,"px");star.style.height="".concat(size,"px");star.style.top="".concat(random(0,100),"%");star.style.left="".concat(random(0,100),"%");star.style.opacity=random(0.5,1).toFixed(2);star.style.animationDuration="".concat(random(2,5),"s");bg.appendChild(star);}// Sao di chuyển chậm
for(let i=0;i<MOVING_STAR_COUNT;i++){const star=document.createElement('div');star.className='universe-star moving';const size=random(1.5,3.5);star.style.width="".concat(size,"px");star.style.height="".concat(size,"px");star.style.top="".concat(random(0,100),"%");star.style.left="".concat(random(0,100),"%");star.style.opacity=random(0.5,1).toFixed(2);star.style.setProperty('--move-x',"".concat(random(-30,30),"vw"));star.style.setProperty('--move-y',"".concat(random(-20,20),"vh"));star.style.animationDuration="".concat(random(12,22),"s");bg.appendChild(star);}// Hành tinh/quỹ đạo
PLANETS.forEach((p,idx)=>{const orbit=document.createElement('div');orbit.className='universe-orbit';orbit.style.width=orbit.style.height="".concat(p.orbit*2,"px");orbit.style.left="calc(50% - ".concat(p.orbit,"px)");orbit.style.top="calc(50% - ".concat(p.orbit,"px)");orbit.style.animationDuration="".concat(p.speed,"s");// Hành tinh
const planet=document.createElement('div');planet.className='universe-planet'+(idx%2===1?' reverse':'');planet.style.width=planet.style.height="".concat(p.size,"px");planet.style.background=p.color;planet.style.boxShadow="0 0 24px 6px ".concat(p.glow);planet.style.filter='blur(0.5px)';orbit.appendChild(planet);bg.appendChild(orbit);});},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"universe-bg",ref:bgRef,"aria-hidden":"true"});}
